Classes in com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sagealert.shared used by com.google.code.sagetvaddons.sagealert.server
Client
          A simple representation of a SageTV client; a client, in this context, refers to a client PC, extender, or a placeshifter.
ClientService
          RPC interface for saving/loading Client instances from the server
HandlerService
          Interface for RPC handler operations
NotificationServerSettings
          All notification systems are initiated by an object that implements this interface.
ReporterService
          Interface for RPC reporter operations.
SageAlertEvent
          All events being handled must be converted/packaged into a SageAlertEvent, which is what handlers use to send their notifications.
SageAlertEventMetadata
           
SettingsService
          The RPC interface for the settings server; allows getting/setting generic app data (settings); provides persistent data/state storage
SmtpSettings
          Encapsulates all the settings required to connect to an SMTP server and send alerts via email
TwitterService
           
TwitterSettings
          Store the data required to connect to Twitter
